text: eyata ovun tamange (mas valin yut) ham valata “apata viruddhava oba kumak nisa saksi kiyannehuda?”yi vimasanu æta. eyata eva “siyalu vastunma kata karannata salasvana allahma apavada kata karana lesata pat kaleya. ohuma obava palamu avasthavedida utpadanaya kaleya. (maranayata pat vu) pasuda obava ohu vetama gena enu læba ætteya” yayi pavasanu æta
